hooks.command: if echo '{{tool_input.file_path}}' | grep -qE '\.(ex|exs)$'; then mix format '{{tool_input.file_path}}'; fi
if echo '{{tool_input.file_path}}' | grep -qE '\.(ex|exs)$'; then mix compile --warnings-as-errors 2>&1 | head -50; fi
if echo '{{tool_input.command}}' | grep -q 'git commit'; then mix format --check-formatted && mix compile --warnings-as-errors && mix deps.unlock --check-unused; fi
